issue.subject: Problem in service definition afer new install
issue.description:
Bug related "here":https://forge.easysdi.org/boards/34/topics/542

---
Hello

I downloaded the latest fi ? Files on your site (version 4.1.0 EasySDI , monitor and proxy , 20.05.2014 ) for installation on the latest Joomla 3.3 .

No worries for the facility itself , but I met two bugs after installation , wanting to add a WMS service , I put them here:

First bug:
Unknown column 'physicalservice_id' in 'eld list' SQL=SELECT CONCAT FROM
rohm_sdi_map_physicalservice WHERE map_id = 1 UNION ( SELECT CONCAT
FROM rohm_sdi_map_virtualservice WHERE map_id = 1)

Second bug:
Cannot add or update a child row: a foreign key constraint fails (`hgwebfr10`.`rohm_sdi_virtualservice`,
CONSTRAINT `rohm_sdi_virtualservice_fk5` FOREIGN KEY (`logroll_id`) REFERENCES `rohm_sdi_sys_logroll`
(`id`)) SQL=INSERT INTO `rohm_sdi_virtualservice` (`guid`,`ordering`,`state`,`created_by`,`created`,`name`,`alias`,`
servicescope_id`,`url`,`serviceconnector_id`,`reectedurl`,`reectedmetadata`,`xsltlename`,`logpath`,`
proxytype_id`,`exceptionlevel_id`,`loglevel_id`,`logroll_id`,`access`) VALUES ('4b2a9bda-
e349-16d4-1d67-ec3627dbf87b','1','0','604','2014-05-30 14:42:52','Test rokin','test-rokin','1','Test
rokin','2','','1','','sdfg','1','1','3','1','1')

That, and thank you for your work !
---

journals.notes:
First bug:

This is a bug related to the addition of the cross-database functionality in version 4.1.0. It is corrected and added to the package 4.2.0.

Second bug:
I can not reproduce this bug. Can you control the contents of the table "rohm_sdi_sys_logroll"? It should contain 4 entries. 
# daily with id 1
# weekly with id 2
# monthly with id 3
# annually with id 4

I wait for your feedback on this last point.

Hi Mr. Hinot,

Have you got any information about Marc' note ?

Thanks a lot.

First bug has been fixed and already package.
Consider that defect can be closed...or will be opened again if second problem does appear anymore...
